articles.description: The cold moon will be the last full moon of 2021 and also the longest full moon of the year when it peaks at at 11:37pm EST on December 18. It will appear full from Friday through Monday.
articles.content:
A last full moon of 2021 is set to rise in the dead of night on Saturday and be seen around the world.
This moons is called the cold moon, which is a Mohawk name that refers to the frigid weather co… [+2649 chars]
